label: specifiedProcessCertification
comment: A process certification specified for this production facility.
A process certification specified for this production process.

rangeIncludes.comment: The process of certifying that a process has met performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements.

domainIncludes.comment: A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
